page.title: 06THE NURSERY,BOYNTON.
page.content: Boynton Nursery is a nursery which has been built up in seven years.The people who own it live in two bungalows which have been made into one.They have stalls on two markets. One is at Bridlington and the other one is at Pocklington. Bridlington market is on Wedesdays and Saturdays and Pocklington is on Tuesdays. They have two vehicles.One is a van and one is a car.They use them both for Bridlington market but they only use the van for Pocklington.They also have a shop in Rope Walk,Bridlington.There they sell potting compost,seeds,plants garden tools,insecticides,fertilizer and pot plants.They buy in their apple trees,roses,shrubs and a few bedding plants from wholesalers.They aiso grow some bedding plants as well as buying them in.
